programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom and his team try to piece together what has become of a basketball star and his cheerleader girlfriend who didn't return home after a big game. Grissom thinks that the young lovers may have run off to Mexico but the evidence disputes that theory.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: While processing the house where several showgirls were murdered, Sara is haunted by the terrified eyes and cryptic dying words of the sixth victim she discovers.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
